UniprotID	P30419
Accession	P30419;A8K7C1;Q9UE09
EntryName	NMT1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Glycylpeptide N-tetradecanoyltransferase 1 (EC 2.3.1.97) (Myristoyl-CoA:protein N-myristoyltransferase 1) (HsNMT1) (NMT 1) (Type I N-myristoyltransferase) (Peptide N-myristoyltransferase 1) (Protein-lysine myristoyltransferase NMT1) (EC 2.3.1.-)
GeneName	NMT1 NMT
Length	496
Function	Adds a myristoyl group to the N-terminal glycine residue of certain cellular and viral proteins (PubMed:22865860, PubMed:25255805, PubMed:32686708, PubMed:34999170, PubMed:9353336, PubMed:9506952). Also able to mediate N-terminal lysine myristoylation of proteins: catalyzes myristoylation of ARF6 on both 'Gly-2' and 'Lys-3' (PubMed:32103017, PubMed:32111831). Lysine myristoylation is required to maintain ARF6 on membranes during the GTPase cycle (PubMed:32103017).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytosol; Membrane
Disorder	0.8853,0.9190,0.9057,0.9329,0.9519,0.9230,0.9396,0.9457,0.9381,0.9308,0.9346,0.9381,0.9473,0.9415,0.9433,0.9433,0.9473,0.9503,0.9621,0.9415,0.9473,0.9381,0.8681,0.8828,0.8655,0.8462,0.8872,0.8741,0.8713,0.8792,0.8235,0.8235,0.8235,0.8162,0.8162,0.7629,0.7595,0.7755,0.7547,0.7459,0.8462,0.8462,0.8343,0.8942,0.8828,0.8655,0.8493,0.8279,0.8050,0.7843,0.7951,0.8596,0.8375,0.8279,0.8125,0.8198,0.8565,0.8565,0.8279,0.8493,0.8375,0.8375,0.8343,0.8198,0.8421,0.8623,0.8792,0.9057,0.8828,0.8828,0.8741,0.8713,0.8792,0.8462,0.8828,0.8765,0.8765,0.8828,0.8235,0.8375,0.8375,0.7755,0.7755,0.7595,0.7595,0.6712,0.6712,0.5807,0.4541,0.5017,0.4619,0.4831,0.4864,0.4901,0.5807,0.5254,0.5296,0.5176,0.4901,0.5707,0.5665,0.5342,0.6089,0.5758,0.5807,0.5951,0.5665,0.5665,0.5254,0.5176,0.5296,0.5901,0.5992,0.6183,0.5456,0.5456,0.5533,0.4901,0.4901,0.5254,0.4582,0.3910,0.4149,0.4220,0.4330,0.4441,0.4725,0.4940,0.4940,0.6322,0.7595,0.7369,0.7459,0.7505,0.6136,0.6755,0.6531,0.6755,0.7916,0.6806,0.6712,0.6427,0.7459,0.7415,0.7369,0.5992,0.5992,0.4541,0.5254,0.4864,0.3840,0.3840,0.3117,0.3053,0.3019,0.3704,0.3774,0.3019,0.2129,0.1852,0.2752,0.1942,0.1791,0.1643,0.1007,0.0592,0.1184,0.1229,0.2129,0.1275,0.0985,0.1583,0.1554,0.2364,0.2436,0.2436,0.2094,0.1184,0.1611,0.1349,0.1449,0.0799,0.1251,0.2193,0.2224,0.1942,0.1942,0.1184,0.0581,0.0443,0.0473,0.0704,0.0749,0.0817,0.0765,0.0364,0.0205,0.0287,0.0618,0.0320,0.0646,0.0380,0.0690,0.0454,0.0380,0.0235,0.0306,0.0506,0.0835,0.1476,0.1671,0.1671,0.1206,0.1070,0.0454,0.0253,0.0494,0.0704,0.0341,0.0372,0.0618,0.0690,0.0605,0.0581,0.0506,0.0294,0.0463,0.0734,0.0799,0.0817,0.0851,0.0662,0.0734,0.1137,0.0646,0.1373,0.1206,0.0749,0.0581,0.0662,0.0555,0.0676,0.0618,0.0631,0.0631,0.1070,0.1759,0.1702,0.1137,0.0888,0.1028,0.0676,0.0506,0.0433,0.0414,0.0765,0.0380,0.0817,0.1349,0.1942,0.1914,0.1942,0.1251,0.1298,0.2034,0.1298,0.0662,0.0690,0.0581,0.0581,0.0380,0.0341,0.0443,0.0780,0.0888,0.0581,0.0306,0.0631,0.0618,0.0704,0.0454,0.0704,0.0749,0.0835,0.0
